contentrichtext.text: {{lowercase|z Carinae}} ;z Carinae The [[Bayer designation]] '''z Carinae''' (z Car) is shared by two stars in the constellation Carina: * [[HD 96566]] (z<sup>1</sup> Carinae), the brighter of the pair, often referred to as simply ''z Carinae'' * [[V371 Carinae]] (z<sup>2</sup> Carinae) They are separated by 0.53Â° on the sky. ;Z Carinae The [[variable star designation]] '''Z Carinae''' * is used by [[HD 88946]], a 10.20<sub>m</sub> [[Mira variable]]. {{SIA|astronomical objects}} [[Category:Carina (constellation)]] [[Category:Bayer objects|Carinae, z]] [[Category:Objects named with variable star designations|Carinae, Z]]
